command.description: Action to perform: 'get' reads content, 'set' writes new content, 'clear' empties clipboard

content.description: Content to write to clipboard. Required for setClipboard command. Supports text or file paths

content_type.description: Type of content to read: 'text' for plain text, 'filePaths' for copied files. Required for getClipboard

result.description: Clipboard content (text/paths) for get, success message for set/clear, error details if failed
